article.title: Port Forwarding on Router: Complete Guide 2025
article.intro: Port forwarding is one of the most in-demand and simultaneously challenging topics for beginners in home network configuration. In this guide, we'll break down in detail how to properly set up port forwarding for any purpose: from game servers to surveillance systems.

whatIs.title: üîç What is Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding is a technology that allows redirecting network requests from the router's external port to a specific port of a device on your local network.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: External requests come to your router

router.title: Router
router.desc: Redirects requests to the right device

whyNeed.title: üéØ Why Do You Need Port Forwarding?

rows.usage: Access to media library from any network

securityWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important to Understand
securityWarning.content: Port forwarding opens access to your device from the internet. Always follow security measures and don't open ports unnecessarily!

steps.title: Determine the static IP address of the device
steps.content: Your device (PC, server, camera) needs a permanent local IP address so the router knows where to redirect traffic.

windows.title: How to find IP address in Windows:
windows.hint: Look for the "IPv4 Address" line for your network connection

linuxMac.title: How to find IP address in Linux/macOS:

steps.title: Configure static IP
steps.content: To prevent the IP address from changing, configure it statically:
steps.router: In the router: Assign a static IP via DHCP reservation
steps.device: On the device: Manually configure a static IP in network settings

steps.title: Find out the external IP address
steps.content: This is the address that other users see on the internet:
steps.codeTitle: Ways to find out the external IP:
steps.code:
# Via command line
curl ifconfig.me

# Or visit sites:
# - whatismyipaddress.com
# - 2ip.ru
# - myip.com

steps.title: Determine the required ports
steps.content: Find out which ports your application or service uses. This information is usually in the documentation.

steps.title: Log in to the router's control panel
steps.content: Open a browser and enter the router's IP address. Usually it's:
steps.note: The default login/password are usually on the sticker on the router.

steps.title: Find the port forwarding section
steps.content: The section may be called differently:

steps.title: Fill in the port forwarding parameters
steps.content: You will need to specify:
params: External Port: Port that will be open on the router
Internal IP: Static IP of your device

steps.title: Save settings
steps.content: After filling in all fields, click "Save" or "Apply". The router may reboot.

steps: Log in to the control panel (192.168.1.1)
Go to: Advanced ‚Üí NAT Forwarding ‚Üí Virtual Servers
fields: Service Type: Select from the list or enter your own
External Port: Port for external access
Internal Port: Port on the device
IP Address: Local IP of the device

steps: Go to: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding
fields: Local IP: IP of your device

steps: Log in to the panel (my.keenetic.net or 192.168.1.1)
fields: External port: Port for external access
Destination IP: Local IP of device

steps.title: Use online services
steps.content: Sites for checking open ports:

steps.title: Checking via command line
steps.code:
# Use telnet or nc (netcat) 
telnet your-external-ip port 
# Or using nmap 
nmap -p port your-external-ip

steps.title: Testing the service
steps.content: Try connecting to your service from another device outside the local network (for example via mobile internet).

successTips.title: ‚úÖ Signs of successful setup
tips: Port shows as "open" in online checker
You can connect to the service from outside

problems.title: üö´ Port is still closed
items: Check the firewall: Add an exception to Windows Firewall or other firewall
Reboot the router: Sometimes settings are applied only after reboot
Check IP address: Make sure the device has the correct static IP
Disable UPnP: Sometimes UPnP conflicts with manual port settings

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Provider's dynamic IP
problems.content: If you have a dynamic IP, it may change. Solutions:
items: Check IP: Regularly update information about current IP
Static IP: Order a static IP from the provider (paid)

problems.title: üîí Double NAT
problems.content: The problem occurs when you have multiple routers on the network:
items: Bridge mode: Set one of the routers to bridge mode
DMZ: Configure DMZ on the main router for the second router
Forwarding on both: Configure forwarding on both routers

rules.title: üîê Critical rules
items: Open only necessary ports - each open port increases the attack surface
Use complex passwords on all services accessible from outside
Consider VPN as a more secure alternative to port forwarding

bestPractices.title: üéØ Best practices
items: Use non-standard ports to reduce scanner attention
Set up automatic port disabling on schedule
Regularly check logs for suspicious activity
Use fail2ban or similar to block suspicious IPs

checklist.title: üìã Security checklist
items: I have opened only necessary ports
Complex passwords are set on services
Software is updated to the latest version
I monitor connections to open ports
I have a plan in case of compromise

comments.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first!

whatIs.title: üîç Mik√§ on porttien v√§litys?
whatIs.content: Porttien v√§litys (Port Forwarding) on teknologia, joka mahdollistaa verkkopyynt√∂jen uudelleenohjauksen reitittimen ulkoisesta portista laitteen tiettyyn porttiin paikallisessa verkossasi.

meta.title: Port Forwarding: Complete Gids 2025
meta.description: Port forwarding op router: van basis tot geavanceerde instellingen. Stapsgewijze instructies voor alle populaire routermodel.
meta.ogDescription: Stapsgewijze gids voor het instellen van port forwarding voor games, servers en externe toegang. Instructies voor alle populaire routers.
meta.twitterDescription: Complete gids voor het instellen van port forwarding voor games en servers

article.title: Port Forwarding: Complete Gids 2025
article.intro: Port forwarding is een van de meest gevraagde en tegelijkertijd moeilijkste onderwerpen voor beginners in thuisnetwerkconfiguratie. In deze gids bespreken we gedetailleerd hoe u port forwarding correct kunt instellen voor elk doel: van game servers tot bewakingssystemen.

whatIs.title: üîç Wat is Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding is een technologie die het mogelijk maakt netwerkaanvragen van de externe poort van de router om te leiden naar een specifieke poort van een apparaat in uw lokale netwerk.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: Externe aanvragen komen bij uw router aan

router.title: Router
router.desc: Leidt aanvragen om naar het benodigde apparaat

meta.title: Port Forwarding: Kumpletong Gabay 2025
meta.description: Port forwarding sa router: mula sa mga batayan hanggang advanced na setup. Step-by-step na mga tagubilin para sa lahat ng sikat na router model.
meta.ogDescription: Step-by-step na gabay sa pag-set up ng port forwarding para sa mga laro, server, at remote access. Mga tagubilin para sa lahat ng sikat na router.
meta.twitterDescription: Kumpletong gabay sa pag-set up ng port forwarding para sa mga laro at server

article.title: Port Forwarding: Kumpletong Gabay 2025
article.intro: Ang port forwarding ay isa sa mga pinaka-hinahanap at sabay na pinakamahirap na paksa para sa mga nagsisimula sa pagsasaayos ng home network. Sa gabay na ito, tatalakayin namin nang detalyado kung paano tamang i-set up ang port forwarding para sa anumang layunin: mula sa mga game server hanggang sa mga surveillance system.

whatIs.title: üîç Ano ang Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding ay isang teknolohiya na nagpapahintulot sa pag-redirect ng mga network request mula sa external port ng router patungo sa isang tiyak na port ng device sa iyong lokal na network.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: Ang mga panlabas na kahilingan ay dumarating sa iyong router

router.title: Router
router.desc: Nagre-redirect ng mga kahilingan sa kinakailangang device

device.title: Iyong Device
device.desc: Tumatanggap at nagpoproseso ng mga kahilingan

whyNeed.title: üéØ Bakit kailangan mo ng Port Forwarding?

rows.usage: Paglikha ng multiplayer server para sa mga laro
Pagho-host ng website sa home server
Pamamahala ng computer mula sa labas
Access sa media library mula sa anumang network

securityWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Mahalagang maunawaan
securityWarning.content: Ang port forwarding ay nagbubukas ng access sa iyong device mula sa internet. Laging sundin ang mga hakbang sa seguridad at huwag magbukas ng mga port na hindi kailangan!

steps.title: Tukuyin ang static IP address ng device
steps.content: Ang iyong device (PC, server, camera) ay nangangailangan ng permanenteng lokal na IP address upang malaman ng router kung saan i-forward ang traffic.

windows.title: Paano malaman ang IP address sa Windows:
windows.hint: Hanapin ang linya na "IPv4 Address" para sa iyong network connection

linuxMac.title: Paano malaman ang IP address sa Linux/macOS:

steps.title: I-configure ang static IP
steps.content: Upang maiwasan ang pagbabago ng IP address, i-configure ito bilang static:
steps.router: Sa router: Magtalaga ng static IP sa pamamagitan ng DHCP reservation
steps.device: Sa device: Manu-manong i-configure ang static IP sa network settings

steps.title: Alamin ang external IP address
steps.content: Ito ang address na nakikita ng ibang mga user sa internet:
steps.codeTitle: Mga paraan upang malaman ang external IP:
steps.code:
# Sa pamamagitan ng command line
curl ifconfig.me

# O bisitahin ang mga site:
# - whatismyipaddress.com
# - 2ip.ru
# - myip.com

steps.title: Tukuyin ang mga kinakailangang port
steps.content: Alamin kung aling mga port ang ginagamit ng iyong application o serbisyo. Ang impormasyong ito ay karaniwang nasa documentation.

steps.title: Mag-log in sa control panel ng router
steps.content: Buksan ang browser at ipasok ang IP address ng router. Karaniwan itong:
steps.note: Ang username/password ay karaniwang nakalista sa sticker sa router.

steps.title: Hanapin ang section ng port forwarding
steps.content: Ang section ay maaaring may iba't ibang pangalan:

steps.title: Punan ang mga parameter ng port forwarding
steps.content: Kailangan mong tukuyin ang:
params: External Port: Port na bubuksan sa router
Internal IP: Static IP ng iyong device

steps.title: I-save ang mga setting
steps.content: Matapos punan ang lahat ng field, pindutin ang "Save" o "Apply". Maaaring mag-restart ang router.

routers.title: üì° Mga tagubilin para sa sikat na router

steps: Pumunta sa: Advanced ‚Üí NAT Forwarding ‚Üí Virtual Servers
fields: Service Type: Piliin mula sa listahan o ipasok ang iyong sarili
External Port: Port para sa access mula sa labas
IP Address: Lokal na IP ng device

steps: Pumunta sa: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding
fields: Local IP: IP ng iyong device
External port: Port para sa access mula sa labas
IP address ng tatanggap: Lokal na IP ng device

steps.title: Gumamit ng mga online service
steps.content: Mga site para sa pag-check ng mga bukas na port:

steps.title: Pag-verify sa pamamagitan ng command line
steps.code:
# Gamitin ang telnet o nc (netcat) 
telnet iyong-external-ip port 
# O gamit ang nmap 
nmap -p port iyong-external-ip

steps.title: Pagsusuri ng serbisyo
steps.content: Subukang kumonekta sa iyong serbisyo mula sa ibang device sa labas ng lokal na network (halimbawa sa pamamagitan ng mobile internet).

successTips.title: ‚úÖ Mga palatandaan ng matagumpay na setup
tips: Ang port ay ipinapakita bilang "bukas" sa online checker
Maaari kang kumonekta sa serbisyo mula sa labas
Ang serbisyo ay tumatakbo nang matatag nang walang mga pagputol

problems.title: üö´ Sarado pa rin ang port
items: Suriin ang firewall: Magdagdag ng exception sa Windows Firewall o ibang firewall
I-restart ang router: Minsan ang mga setting ay inilalapat lamang pagkatapos ng restart
Suriin ang IP address: Siguraduhin na ang device ay may tamang static IP
I-disable ang UPnP: Minsan ang UPnP ay sumasalungat sa manual na port settings

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Dynamic IP ng provider
problems.content: Kung mayroon kang dynamic IP, maaari itong magbago. Mga solusyon:
items: Gumamit ng DDNS: Mga serbisyo tulad ng No-IP, DuckDNS
Suriin ang IP: Regular na i-update ang impormasyon tungkol sa kasalukuyang IP
Static IP: Mag-order ng static IP mula sa provider (bayad)

problems.title: üîí Double NAT
problems.content: Ang problema ay nangyayari kapag mayroon kang maraming router sa network:
items: Bridge mode: I-set up ang isa sa mga router sa bridge mode
DMZ: I-set up ang DMZ sa pangunahing router para sa pangalawang router
Forwarding sa pareho: I-set up ang forwarding sa parehong router

rules.title: üîê Mga kritikal na patakaran
items: Buksan lamang ang mga kinakailangang port - bawat bukas na port ay nagpapataas ng attack surface
Gumamit ng kumplikadong mga password sa lahat ng serbisyo na naa-access mula sa labas
Regular na i-update ang software - alisin ang mga vulnerabilities
Subaybayan ang mga koneksyon gamit ang mga log ng router
Isaalang-alang ang VPN bilang mas ligtas na alternatibo sa port forwarding

bestPractices.title: üéØ Mga pinakamahusay na kasanayan
items: Gumamit ng hindi karaniwang mga port upang mabawasan ang pansin ng mga scanner
I-set up ang awtomatikong pag-disable ng mga port ayon sa iskedyul
Regular na suriin ang mga log para sa kahina-hinalang aktibidad
Gumamit ng fail2ban o katulad para sa pag-block ng mga kahina-hinalang IP

checklist.title: üìã Checklist sa seguridad
items: Binubuksan ko lamang ang mga kinakailangang port
Ang mga kumplikadong password ay nakatakda sa mga serbisyo
Na-update ang software sa pinakabagong bersyon
Sinusubaybayan ko ang mga koneksyon sa mga bukas na port
Mayroon akong plano sa kaso ng pag-compromise

comments.title: Mga Komento
comments.noComments: Wala pang mga komento. Maging una!

meta.title: Port Forwarding: Panduan Lengkap 2025
meta.description: Port forwarding di router: dari dasar hingga pengaturan lanjutan. Petunjuk langkah demi langkah untuk semua model router populer.
meta.ogDescription: Panduan langkah demi langkah untuk mengatur port forwarding untuk game, server, dan akses remote. Instruksi untuk semua router populer.
meta.twitterDescription: Panduan lengkap untuk mengatur port forwarding untuk game dan server

article.title: Port Forwarding: Panduan Lengkap 2025
article.intro: Port forwarding adalah salah satu topik paling diminati dan sekaligus paling sulit bagi pemula dalam konfigurasi jaringan rumah. Dalam panduan ini, kami akan membahas secara detail cara mengatur port forwarding dengan benar untuk tujuan apa pun: dari server game hingga sistem pengawasan.

whatIs.title: üîç Apa itu Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding adalah teknologi yang memungkinkan pengalihan permintaan jaringan dari port eksternal router ke port tertentu perangkat di jaringan lokal Anda.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: Permintaan eksternal tiba di router Anda

router.title: Router
router.desc: Mengalihkan permintaan ke perangkat yang diperlukan

rows.usage: Akses ke perpustakaan media dari jaringan mana pun

securityWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Penting untuk Dipahami
securityWarning.content: Port forwarding membuka akses ke perangkat Anda dari internet. Selalu ikuti langkah-langkah keamanan dan jangan buka port yang tidak perlu!

steps.title: Tentukan alamat IP statis perangkat
steps.content: Perangkat Anda (PC, server, kamera) membutuhkan alamat IP lokal permanen agar router tahu ke mana harus meneruskan lalu lintas.

windows.title: Cara mengetahui alamat IP di Windows:
windows.hint: Cari baris "IPv4 Address" untuk koneksi jaringan Anda

linuxMac.title: Cara mengetahui alamat IP di Linux/macOS:

steps.title: Konfigurasi IP statis
steps.content: Untuk mencegah perubahan alamat IP, konfigurasikan secara statis:
steps.router: Di router: Tetapkan IP statis melalui DHCP reservation
steps.device: Di perangkat: Konfigurasi IP statis secara manual di pengaturan jaringan

steps.title: Ketahui alamat IP eksternal
steps.content: Ini adalah alamat yang dilihat pengguna lain di internet:
steps.code:
# Melalui command line
curl ifconfig.me

# Atau kunjungi situs:
# - whatismyipaddress.com
# - 2ip.ru
# - myip.com

steps.title: Tentukan port yang diperlukan
steps.content: Ketahui port mana yang digunakan aplikasi atau layanan Anda. Informasi ini biasanya ada di dokumentasi.

steps.title: Masuk ke panel kontrol router
steps.content: Buka browser dan masukkan alamat IP router. Biasanya ini:
steps.note: Username/password default biasanya tertera pada stiker di router.

steps.title: Cari bagian port forwarding
steps.content: Bagian mungkin disebut berbeda:

steps.title: Isi parameter port forwarding
steps.content: Anda perlu menentukan:
params: Port Eksternal: Port yang akan dibuka di router

steps.title: Simpan pengaturan
steps.content: Setelah mengisi semua bidang, tekan "Save" atau "Apply". Router mungkin restart.

steps: Pergi ke: Advanced ‚Üí NAT Forwarding ‚Üí Virtual Servers
fields: Service Type: Pilih dari daftar atau masukkan sendiri
External Port: Port untuk akses dari luar

steps: Pergi ke: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding

fields: Port eksternal: Port untuk akses dari luar

steps.title: Gunakan layanan online
steps.content: Situs untuk memeriksa port terbuka:

steps.title: Verifikasi melalui command line
steps.code:
# Gunakan telnet atau nc (netcat) 
telnet IP-eksternal-anda port 
# Atau menggunakan nmap 
nmap -p port IP-eksternal-anda

steps.title: Pengujian layanan
steps.content: Coba sambungkan ke layanan Anda dari perangkat lain di luar jaringan lokal (misalnya melalui internet seluler).

successTips.title: ‚úÖ Tanda setup berhasil
tips: Port ditampilkan sebagai "terbuka" dalam pemeriksa online
Anda dapat terhubung ke layanan dari luar

problems.title: üö´ Port masih tertutup
items: Periksa firewall: Tambahkan pengecualian di Windows Firewall atau firewall lain
Restart router: Terkadang pengaturan hanya diterapkan setelah restart
Periksa alamat IP: Pastikan perangkat memiliki IP statis yang benar
Nonaktifkan UPnP: Terkadang UPnP bertentangan dengan pengaturan port manual

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è IP dinamis penyedia
problems.content: Jika Anda memiliki IP dinamis, dapat berubah. Solusi:
items: Periksa IP: Perbarui informasi tentang IP saat ini secara teratur
IP statis: Pesan IP statis dari penyedia (berbayar)

problems.title: üîí NAT ganda
problems.content: Masalah terjadi ketika Anda memiliki beberapa router di jaringan:
items: Mode jembatan: Atur salah satu router dalam mode jembatan
DMZ: Atur DMZ di router utama untuk router kedua
Forwarding di keduanya: Atur forwarding di kedua router

rules.title: üîê Aturan kritis
items: Hanya buka port yang diperlukan - setiap port terbuka meningkatkan permukaan serangan
Gunakan kata sandi kompleks di semua layanan yang dapat diakses dari luar
Perbarui perangkat lunak secara teratur - hapus kerentanan
Pertimbangkan VPN sebagai alternatif yang lebih aman untuk port forwarding

bestPractices.title: üéØ Praktik terbaik
items: Gunakan port non-standar untuk mengurangi perhatian pemindai
Atur penonaktifan otomatis port sesuai jadwal
Periksa log secara teratur untuk aktivitas mencurigakan
Gunakan fail2ban atau serupa untuk memblokir IP mencurigakan

checklist.title: üìã Daftar periksa keamanan
items: Saya hanya membuka port yang diperlukan
Kata sandi kompleks ditetapkan di layanan
Perangkat lunak diperbarui ke versi terbaru
Saya memantau koneksi ke port terbuka
Saya memiliki rencana jika terjadi kompromi

comments.title: Komentar
comments.noComments: Belum ada komentar. Jadilah yang pertama!

meta.title: Port Forwarding: Guida Completa 2025
meta.description: Port forwarding sul router: dalle basi alle impostazioni avanzate. Istruzioni passo-passo per tutti i modelli di router pi√π popolari.
meta.ogDescription: Guida passo-passo per configurare il port forwarding per giochi, server e accesso remoto. Istruzioni per tutti i router pi√π popolari.
meta.twitterDescription: Guida completa per configurare il port forwarding per giochi e server

article.title: Port Forwarding: Guida Completa 2025
article.intro: Il port forwarding √® uno degli argomenti pi√π richiesti e allo stesso tempo pi√π difficili per i principianti nella configurazione di reti domestiche. In questa guida, esamineremo in dettaglio come configurare correttamente il port forwarding per qualsiasi scopo: dai server di gioco ai sistemi di sorveglianza.

whatIs.title: üîç Cos'√® il Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding √® una tecnologia che consente di reindirizzare le richieste di rete dalla porta esterna del router a una porta specifica di un dispositivo nella tua rete locale.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: Le richieste esterne arrivano al tuo router

router.title: Router
router.desc: Reindirizza le richieste al dispositivo necessario

whyNeed.title: üéØ Perch√© hai bisogno del Port Forwarding?

rows.usage: Creazione di server multiplayer per giochi
Hosting di siti web su server domestico
Accesso alla libreria multimediale da qualsiasi rete

securityWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Importante capire
securityWarning.content: Il port forwarding apre l'accesso al tuo dispositivo da Internet. Segui sempre le misure di sicurezza e non aprire porte non necessarie!

steps.title: Determina l'indirizzo IP statico del dispositivo
steps.content: Il tuo dispositivo (PC, server, telecamera) ha bisogno di un indirizzo IP locale permanente in modo che il router sappia dove inoltrare il traffico.

windows.title: Come trovare l'indirizzo IP in Windows:
windows.hint: Cerca la riga "Indirizzo IPv4" per la tua connessione di rete

linuxMac.title: Come trovare l'indirizzo IP in Linux/macOS:

steps.title: Configura l'IP statico
steps.content: Per evitare che l'indirizzo IP cambi, configuralo staticamente:
steps.router: Nel router: Assegna un IP statico tramite riserva DHCP
steps.device: Sul dispositivo: Configura l'IP statico manualmente nelle impostazioni di rete

steps.title: Scopri l'indirizzo IP esterno
steps.content: Questo √® l'indirizzo che altri utenti vedono su Internet:
steps.code:
# Tramite riga di comando
curl ifconfig.me

# O visita i siti:
# - whatismyipaddress.com
# - 2ip.ru
# - myip.com

steps.title: Determina le porte necessarie
steps.content: Scopri quali porte utilizza la tua applicazione o servizio. Queste informazioni sono solitamente nella documentazione.

steps.title: Accedi al pannello di controllo del router
steps.content: Apri il browser e inserisci l'indirizzo IP del router. Di solito √®:
steps.note: Username/password di default sono solitamente indicati sull'etichetta del router.

steps.title: Trova la sezione port forwarding
steps.content: La sezione pu√≤ chiamarsi in modo diverso:

steps.title: Compila i parametri del port forwarding
steps.content: Devi specificare:
params: Porta esterna: Porta che sar√† aperta sul router
IP interno: IP statico del tuo dispositivo

steps.title: Salva le impostazioni
steps.content: Dopo aver compilato tutti i campi, clicca "Salva" o "Applica". Il router potrebbe riavviarsi.

steps: Vai a: Advanced ‚Üí NAT Forwarding ‚Üí Virtual Servers
fields: Service Type: Seleziona dall'elenco o inserisci il tuo
External Port: Porta per accesso esterno
IP Address: IP locale del dispositivo

steps: Vai a: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding
fields: Local IP: IP del tuo dispositivo
Porta esterna: Porta per accesso esterno
IP destinazione: IP locale del dispositivo

verification.title: ‚úÖ Verifica del funzionamento del port forwarding

steps.title: Usa servizi online
steps.content: Siti per controllare le porte aperte:

steps.title: Verifica tramite riga di comando
steps.code:
# Usa telnet o nc (netcat) 
telnet tuo-ip-esterno porta 
# O usando nmap 
nmap -p porta tuo-ip-esterno

steps.title: Test del servizio
steps.content: Prova a connetterti al tuo servizio da un altro dispositivo al di fuori della rete locale (ad esempio tramite internet mobile).

successTips.title: ‚úÖ Segni di configurazione riuscita
tips: La porta viene mostrata come "aperta" nel controllore online
Il servizio funziona stabilmente senza interruzioni

problems.title: üö´ La porta √® ancora chiusa
items: Controlla il firewall: Aggiungi un'eccezione in Windows Firewall o altro firewall
Riavvia il router: A volte le impostazioni vengono applicate solo dopo il riavvio
Controlla l'indirizzo IP: Assicurati che il dispositivo abbia l'IP statico corretto
Disabilita UPnP: A volte UPnP entra in conflitto con le impostazioni manuali delle porte

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è IP dinamico del provider
problems.content: Se hai un IP dinamico, pu√≤ cambiare. Soluzioni:
items: Controlla l'IP: Aggiorna regolarmente le informazioni sull'IP corrente
IP statico: Ordina un IP statico dal provider (a pagamento)

problems.title: üîí Doppio NAT
problems.content: Il problema si verifica quando hai pi√π router nella rete:
items: Modalit√† bridge: Imposta uno dei router in modalit√† bridge
DMZ: Imposta DMZ sul router principale per il secondo router
Forwarding su entrambi: Imposta il forwarding su entrambi i router

rules.title: üîê Regole critiche
items: Apri solo le porte necessarie - ogni porta aperta aumenta la superficie di attacco
Usa password complesse su tutti i servizi accessibili dall'esterno
Aggiorna regolarmente il software - rimuovi le vulnerabilit√†
Monitora le connessioni utilizzando i log del router
Considera una VPN come alternativa pi√π sicura al port forwarding

bestPractices.title: üéØ Best practice
items: Usa porte non standard per ridurre l'attenzione degli scanner
Imposta la disabilitazione automatica delle porte in base alla programmazione
Controlla regolarmente i log per attivit√† sospette
Usa fail2ban o simile per bloccare IP sospetti

checklist.title: üìã Lista di controllo sicurezza
items: Ho aperto solo le porte necessarie
Sui servizi sono impostate password complesse
Monitoro le connessioni alle porte aperte
Ho un piano in caso di compromissione

comments.title: Commenti
comments.noComments: Ancora nessun commento. Sii il primo!

meta.title: Port Forwarding: Panduan Lengkap 2025
meta.description: Port forwarding di router: daripada asas kepada tetapan lanjutan. Arahan langkah demi langkah untuk semua model router popular.
meta.ogDescription: Panduan langkah demi langkah untuk menyediakan port forwarding untuk permainan, pelayan dan akses jauh. Arahan untuk semua router popular.
meta.twitterDescription: Panduan lengkap untuk menyediakan port forwarding untuk permainan dan pelayan

article.title: Port Forwarding: Panduan Lengkap 2025
article.intro: Port forwarding adalah antara topik paling diperlukan dan sekali gus paling sukar untuk pemula dalam konfigurasi rangkaian rumah. Dalam panduan ini, kami akan membincangkan secara terperinci cara menyediakan port forwarding dengan betul untuk apa jua tujuan: daripada pelayan permainan kepada sistem pengawasan.

whatIs.title: üîç Apa itu Port Forwarding?
whatIs.content: Port Forwarding ialah teknologi yang membolehkan permintaan rangkaian dihalakan semula daripada port luar router ke port tertentu peranti dalam rangkaian tempatan anda.

internet.title: Internet
internet.desc: Permintaan luar tiba di router anda

router.title: Router
router.desc: Menghala semula permintaan kepada peranti yang diperlukan

rows.usage: Hosting laman web pada pelayan rumah
Akses kepada perpustakaan media dari mana-mana rangkaian

securityWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Penting untuk difahami
securityWarning.content: Port forwarding membuka akses kepada peranti anda dari internet. Sentiasa ikuti langkah-langkah keselamatan dan jangan buka port yang tidak diperlukan!

steps.title: Tentukan alamat IP statik peranti
steps.content: Peranti anda (PC, pelayan, kamera) memerlukan alamat IP tempatan yang kekal supaya router tahu ke mana untuk menghantar trafik.

windows.title: Cara mengetahui alamat IP di Windows:
windows.hint: Cari baris "IPv4 Address" untuk sambungan rangkaian anda

linuxMac.title: Cara mengetahui alamat IP di Linux/macOS:

steps.title: Konfigurasikan IP statik
steps.content: Untuk mengelakkan perubahan alamat IP, konfigurasikannya secara statik:
steps.router: Di router: Tetapkan IP statik melalui tempahan DHCP
steps.device: Di peranti: Konfigurasikan IP statik secara manual dalam tetapan rangkaian

steps.title: Ketahui alamat IP luaran
steps.content: Ini adalah alamat yang dilihat pengguna lain di internet:
steps.code:
# Melalui baris arahan
curl ifconfig.me

# Atau lawati laman web:
# - whatismyipaddress.com
# - 2ip.ru
# - myip.com

steps.title: Tentukan port yang diperlukan
steps.content: Ketahui port mana yang digunakan aplikasi atau perkhidmatan anda. Maklumat ini biasanya terdapat dalam dokumentasi.

steps.title: Log masuk ke panel kawalan router
steps.content: Buka penyemak imbas dan masukkan alamat IP router. Biasanya ini:
steps.note: Nama pengguna/kata laluan lalai biasanya disenaraikan pada pelekat di router.

steps.title: Cari bahagian port forwarding
steps.content: Bahagian mungkin dipanggil dengan nama yang berbeza:

steps.title: Isi parameter port forwarding
steps.content: Anda perlu menentukan:
params: Port Luaran: Port yang akan dibuka pada router

steps.title: Simpan tetapan
steps.content: Setelah mengisi semua medan, tekan "Simpan" atau "Gunakan". Router mungkin dimulakan semula.

steps: Pergi ke: Advanced ‚Üí NAT Forwarding ‚Üí Virtual Servers
fields: Service Type: Pilih dari senarai atau masukkan sendiri
External Port: Port untuk akses dari luar

steps: Pergi ke: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding

fields: Port luaran: Port untuk akses dari luar

steps.title: Gunakan perkhidmatan dalam talian
steps.content: Laman web untuk memeriksa port terbuka:

steps.title: Pengesahan melalui baris arahan
steps.code:
# Gunakan telnet atau nc (netcat) 
telnet IP-luar-anda port 
# Atau menggunakan nmap 
nmap -p port IP-luar-anda

steps.title: Ujian perkhidmatan
steps.content: Cuba sambung ke perkhidmatan anda dari peranti lain di luar rangkaian tempatan (contohnya melalui internet mudah alih).

successTips.title: ‚úÖ Tanda persediaan berjaya
tips: Port dipaparkan sebagai "terbuka" dalam pemeriksa dalam talian
Anda boleh menyambung ke perkhidmatan dari luar

problems.title: üö´ Port masih tertutup
items: Periksa firewall: Tambah pengecualian dalam Windows Firewall atau firewall lain
Mulakan semula router: Kadang-kadang tetapan hanya digunakan selepas dimulakan semula
Periksa alamat IP: Pastikan peranti mempunyai IP statik yang betul
Nyahdayakan UPnP: Kadang-kadang UPnP bercanggah dengan tetapan port manual

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è IP dinamik pembekal
problems.content: Jika anda mempunyai IP dinamik, ia boleh berubah. Penyelesaian:
items: Periksa IP: Kemas kini maklumat tentang IP semasa secara berkala
IP statik: Pesan IP statik dari pembekal (berbayar)

problems.title: üîí NAT berganda
problems.content: Masalah timbul apabila anda mempunyai beberapa router dalam rangkaian:
items: Mod jambatan: Tetapkan salah satu router dalam mod jambatan
DMZ: Tetapkan DMZ pada router utama untuk router kedua
Forwarding pada kedua-dua: Tetapkan forwarding pada kedua-dua router

rules.title: üîê Peraturan kritikal
items: Hanya buka port yang diperlukan - setiap port terbuka meningkatkan permukaan serangan
Gunakan kata laluan kompleks pada semua perkhidmatan yang boleh diakses dari luar
Kemas kini perisian secara berkala - hapuskan kelemahan
Pertimbangkan VPN sebagai alternatif yang lebih selamat untuk port forwarding

bestPractices.title: üéØ Amalan terbaik
items: Gunakan port bukan standard untuk mengurangkan perhatian pengimbas
Tetapkan penyahaktifan automatik port mengikut jadual
Periksa log secara berkala untuk aktiviti yang mencurigakan
Gunakan fail2ban atau serupa untuk menyekat IP yang mencurigakan

checklist.title: üìã Senarai semak keselamatan
items: Saya hanya membuka port yang diperlukan
Kata laluan kompleks ditetapkan pada perkhidmatan
Perisian dikemas kini ke versi terkini
Saya memantau sambungan ke port terbuka
Saya mempunyai rancangan sekiranya berlaku kompromi

comments.title: Komen
comments.noComments: Tiada komen lagi. Jadilah yang pertama!

article.title: Port Yo'naltirish: 2025 To'liq Qo'llanma
article.intro: Port yo'naltirish uy tarmog'ini sozlashda yangi boshlovchilar uchun eng talab qilinadigan va bir vaqtning o'zida eng qiyin mavzulardan biridir. Ushbu qo ªllanmada biz port yo ªnaltirishni har qanday maqsadda qanday qilib to ªg ªri sozlashni batafsil muhokama qilamiz: o ªyin serverlaridan tortib monitoring tizimlarigacha.

whatIs.title: üîç Port Yo'naltirish nima?
whatIs.content: Port Yo'naltirish tarmoq so'rovlarini router'ning tashqi portidan mahalliy tarmog'ingizdagi qurilmaning ma'lum bir portiga qayta yo'naltirish imkonini beruvchi texnologiyadir.

Har qanday tarmoqdan media kutubxonasiga kirish

securityWarning.content: Port yo'naltirish qurilmangizga internet orqali kirishni ochadi. Har doim xavfsizlik choralariga rioya qiling va keraksiz portlarni ochmang!

steps.title: Qurilmaning statsik IP manzilini aniqlang
steps.content: Sizning qurilmangiz (PC, server, kamera) router trafikni qayerga yo'naltirishni bilishi uchun doimiy mahalliy IP manziliga ega bo'lishi kerak.

steps.content: Ilovangiz yoki xizmat qaysi portlardan foydalanishini aniqlang. Bu ma'lumot odatda hujjatlarda mavjud.

steps.content: Brauzeringizni oching va router IP manzilini kiriting. Odatda bu:
steps.note: Foydalanuvchi nomi/parol odatda router'ning yorlig'ida ko'rsatilgan.

steps.title: Port yo'naltirish bo'limini toping
steps.content: Bo'lim turli nomlarga ega bo'lishi mumkin:

steps.title: Port yo'naltirish parametrlarini to'ldiring
steps.content: Quyidagilarni ko'rsatishingiz kerak:

steps.title: Sozlamalarni saqlang
steps.content: Barcha maydonlarni to'ldirgandan so'ng, "Saqlash" yoki "Qo'llash" tugmasini bosing. Router qayta ishga tushishi mumkin.

steps: Saqlang va router'ni qayta ishga tushiring
fields: Service Type: Ro'yxatdan tanlang yoki o'zingiz kiring
External Port: Tashqaridan kirish uchun port

steps: O'ting: Advanced Settings ‚Üí WAN ‚Üí Virtual Server/Port Forwarding

fields: Tashqi port: Tashqaridan kirish uchun port

steps.title: Onlayn xizmatlardan foydalaning
steps.content: Ochiq portlarni tekshirish uchun veb-saytlar:

steps.title: Buyruq qatori orqali tekshirish
steps.code:
# telnet yoki nc (netcat) ishlating 
telnet TASHQI-IP port 
# Yoki nmap ishlatgan holda 
nmap -p port TASHQI-IP

steps.title: Xizmatni sinash
steps.content: Mahalliy tarmog'ingizdan tashqarida boshqa qurilmadan (masalan, mobil internet orqali) xizmatingizga ulanishga harakat qiling.

problems.title: üö´ Port hali ham yopiq
items: Firewall'ni tekshiring: Windows Firewall yoki boshqa firewall'da istisno qo'shing
Router'ni qayta ishga tushiring: Ba'zan sozlamalar faqat qayta ishga tushirilgandan keyin qo'llaniladi
IP manzilini tekshiring: Qurilma to'g'ri statsik IP'ga ega ekanligiga ishonch hosil qiling
UPnP ni o'chiring: Ba'zan UPnP qo'lda port sozlamalari bilan to'qnashadi

problems.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Provayderning dinamik IP'si
problems.content: Agar sizda dinamik IP bo'lsa, u o'zgarishi mumkin. Yechimlar:
items: DDNS dan foydalaning: No-IP, DuckDNS kabi xizmatlar
IP ni tekshiring: Joriy IP haqida ma'lumotlarni muntazam yangilang
Statsik IP: Provayderdan statsik IP buyurtma qiling (pullik)

problems.title: üîí Ikkilamchi NAT
problems.content: Muammo tarmog'ingizda bir nechta router bo'lganda yuzaga keladi:
items: Ko'prik rejimi: Router'lardan birini ko'prik rejimiga o'tkazing
DMZ: Ikkinchi router uchun asosiy router'da DMZ sozlang
Ikkalasida yo'naltirish: Ikkala router'da ham yo'naltirishni sozlang

rules.title: üîê Muhim qoidalar
items: Faqat kerakli portlarni oching - har bir ochiq port hujum maydonini kengaytiradi
Tashqaridan kirish mumkin bo'lgan barcha xizmatlarda murakkab parollardan foydalaning
Port yo'naltirish uchun xavfsizroq alternativ sifatida VPN ni ko'rib chiqing

bestPractices.title: üéØ Eng yaxshi amaliyotlar
items: Skannerlarning e'tiborini kamaytirish uchun standart bo'lmagan portlardan foydalaning
Portlarning jadval bo'yicha avtomatik o'chirilishini sozlang
Shubhali faoliyat uchun jurnallarni muntazam tekshiring
Shubhali IP'larni blokirovka qilish uchun fail2ban yoki shunga o'xshash dasturdan foydalaning

comments.noComments: Hali sharhlar yo'q. Birinchi sharh qoldiruvchi bo'ling!
